text: Model Coco Rocha and husband James Conran have another baby on the way! Rocha posted a precious video of their daughter Ioni announcing the news. She captioned it, “ Your attention please! @ ioniconran has a very important announcement to make!! # babyconran2. ” A post shared by Coco Rocha ( @ cocorocha ) on Dec 4, 2017 at 1 : 47pm PST Hours after the baby news, Rocha hit the black carpet at The Bloomberg 50 celebration in New York City, where she debuted her baby bump. Ioni was one of the first to know, but Coco admitted that she was afraid that their two - year - old would spill the beans to everyone! She told Us Weekly, “ When you tell a two -
